law.history: Repealed 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 18, effective July 15, 2004. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 320, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 46, effective July 1, 1978. --Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 6, effective June 16, 1960.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Local examination -- Examining board -- Local license -- Disciplinary action.
